abstrac: We don’t just do the job - We do it right.
bio:
Crystal Web Techs will design you a clean, modern, responsive website that will look great on desktop computers and all mobile devices. 

Crystal Web Techs can provide business websites that will help elevate your presence online with a website that inspires, with technology that works. You will get great functionality with effortless navigation. 

We will help your business tell its story. We will combine quality photos, graphic design, a powerful content management system and cutting edge website technology as we develop your website – and your brand. 

If you need your new corporate website to present a professional image, our Designers can help. Please view our website design portfolio and you will see that our our website designers are among the best in the business.

abstrac: Designed the way that YOU want
bio:
I am a Microsoft Certified Professional and a top web and database designer with 20 years of experience in creating new paradigms for dynamic websites and applications. I have worked on solo projects, team projects, as a tech lead, project manager and developer. 

Please view my partial portfolio and web applications examples at: 

http://www.cowgirlupsoftware.com 

But here are the bare bones of my experience and what I know that can help you get what you want accomplished. 

I have created large web applications for the US Navy, US Marines, First Allied Bank, Internet Securities, Ltd and other clients that are made up of doctor offices, lawyer offices, mortgage companies, bio-research companies and online internet games. 

The more complex and intricate the applications...the more fun that I have developing it! 

My jobs have entailed analyzing complex data, creating intricate data driven databases and client specific queries that are involved in establishing rules and calculations. Plus integrated web applications and sites. This includes design and creation, all queries, stored procedures, all back-end objects and all adaptations and alterations requested by the client. 

I work in ASP.NET 2.0/3.0/3.5/4.0, SQL Server 2000/2005/2008 among many other programming languages, including the full Office Suites and also Sharepoint 2007 and 2010.

I am located outside of San Diego, CA with a full home office with high speed internet and full development suites. I have IM for instant messaging, I am also reachable by phone or cell at any time and of course via email.  I can work as either a W-2 or 1099.

Thank you, 

Beth Kelley

I accept Safe Escrow and SafePay, plus Mastercard, Visa and American Express.I have a full home office with high speed internet and full development suites. I have IM (MSN, Yahoo and ICQ) for instant messaging, I am also reachable by phone or cell at anytime and of course via email.I am located outside of San Diego, CA and even though I am in the Pacific time zone, I have several Eastern time zone clients so I adjust my work hours to work accordingly. I do not outscource anything.  All transactions handled through Guru will be charged an additional 10%.

commnet: It was a pleasure working with Corporate Caliber Media! All of our press releases and media alerts were well written and received the attention needed to get radio and tv appearances. Our event was a huge success with the assistance of Corporate Caliber Media.

abstrac: Corporate experience and ideas without the corporate-sized budget
bio:
Corporate Caliber Media and Marketing is a full-service, boutique marketing, advertising, and public relations firm located in the heart of South Florida. 

The concept is simple: we aim to use our 15 plus years of solid corporate and agency experience to provide small businesses and corporations with affordable, effective options to grow.

We make it our business to get to know you and your business. We’ll take into consideration your vision and your goals, your target market and your competition…then we’ll get to work designing an effective marketing campaign that meets your specific needs.

We can tailor your plan to make it all-inclusive or focus on select elements, based on your budget.

Our capabilities include the full scope of marketing, communications, and advertising making us a single-source provider to simplify your efforts.

bio:
Iryna Accountancy Corporation - www.irynacpa.com - is a CPA firm located in Oakland, California. We offer a variety of services, ranging from tax preparation to consulting to financial statement preparation.

Iryna Accountancy Corporation provides a variety of traditional CPA firm services as well as non-traditional business consulting services. The firm has a particularly strong emphasis in the areas of auditing, accounting and business advising.

Our services are designed to meet your changing needs and interests. Whether you're a family owned business facing next-generation challenges, a growing business looking for right advice on key business issues, or simply planning for a comfortable future, Iryna Accountancy Corporation can meet your objectives.

bio:
Co-founded by a team of experienced IT professionals who have already scripted successful individual careers, Wimoku is your one-stop shop for all your Information Technology Consulting and Software Development Outsourcing requirements.

Our success has been our ability to provide "best-in-class" Application Development and Staffing/Consulting services leveraging a global model to business and corporations around the world. Our vast experience in handling international businesses, a mature onshore- offshore end-to end development process and a well established solution delivery model make us the “preferred vendor” among our clients.

Our vision at Wimoku is to build an institution that is among the most admired companies globally is shared with every employee and is reflected in the way we do business.

We have a hybrid model for all our clients - our resources are located in USA and India and we provide necessary support (technical and non-technical) offsite and offshore. And we charge only the offshore cost for all our projects. We are available any time for our clients for a project or technical discussion. Our payments terms are based on deliverables and we do provide FREE post production support for 90 days. We also provide FREE annual maintenance support or for a cost (for large projects)
We provide highly experienced resources for the cost you choose. We are open to work in Fixed price or T&M model. We offer the best model for client/project

Excellent command of English grammar and usage.

Timely completion of projects well within agreed upon deadlines.

Outstanding page layout skills making finished documents readable and pleasing to the eye.

Off-site work is preferable and usually necessary due to geographic limitations but I can certainly work at your location if it is in my immediate area.

I supply first drafts as soon as possible depending on the size of the project. You may receive drafts of finished products in the medium of your choice, such as CD or other electronic method. Paper copies are always available too. I usually develop documents in MS Word or Framemaker, depending on the size of the project. I can also provide copies in Portable Document Format (pdf).

I would like to receive all available information at the beginning of any project. This includes notes, meeting minutes, previous editions of a given document and available artwork such as photos, line drawings, blueprints and mechanical drawings.

I use complete discretion in all of my transactions. I am willing to sign non-disclosure statements and understand that whatever documents I may accomplish for you are your sole property.

commnet: Headwaters is an asset for those companies seeking marketing. Bill is a fearless leader. Timeliness is not his strong suit however when it comes to creative talent and his ability to network professionals together he gets an A+.

abstrac: Increase the certainty, relevance and ROI of your marketing
bio:
Created the HP and Agilent Education Program.
Managed HP LaserJet Network Printer Brand.
Consulted for Steelcase Corporation on new brand and market positioning.
Managing all branding and market shaping for HP storage, workstations and reseller channel. Was leading corporate PR guy accounting for 65% total PR coverage HP-wide. Grew 6 businesses to $100 million + within 18 months. Have consistent track record to grow startups and improve relevance for small to large companies who value objectivity,& being genuine, trustworthy and transparent so as to be more market-inspired. Current focus includes technology, new business-sponsored online customer communities, health care/fitness, wellness, alternative energies/environment, bioscience and any market where relationships, trust, attitudes and motivated customers can inspire business growth.

We prefer open client exchanges so we can account for meaningful, two-way accountable and prosperous relationships. Today's customers are savvy yet many companies still operate as if little has changed. They opt to talk at customers instead of with them and tend to position themselves outside of the inner circle of what really matters to customer groups. We help to present your better self, integrate that identity across digital and traditional media and create new, exciting growth strategies.  
While we see most innovation happening in startups to small businesses, we also see blind spots so assuming a position of active objectivity seems to close the gaps for clients. When we accept a client, we expect to see double digit growth as a result. current clients enjoy a 50-70% growth rate.

We require new clients to pay 50% down at the start of a project and the balance on completion. Clients who sign us up as their marketing firm of record will be able to set a run rate if they wish to a

bio:
Professional page layout of books, newsletters, manuals, programs, etc. Satisfaction guaranteed.

Your book...Your way!
I have 30 years experience with book interior layout, including college-level textbooks, trade fiction and non-fiction, manuals, etc. I work with clients to satisfy their design needs. I will not compromise professional standards, but otherwise will design to please.
I respond quickly to inquiries and get the job done in a timely manner.
I prefer to work on my own computer, but I'm willing to meet client within the San Francisco Bay Area. I have done many projects with authors all over the US, strictly by email.
